title: "IBM announces AI based chemistry lab: RoboRXN"
excerpt: "IBM has announced on its blog page the development of an AI/cloud-based chemistry lab named RoboRXN. Its purpose is to help chemists develop new materials in a faster and more efficient way than the current trial-and-error process."
